scripts.start:dev: yarn start:psql:local && yarn tsc && yarn nodemon local
scripts.lambda:deploy: claudia create --name crotonLambda --set-env-from-json envVariables.json --handler lambda.handler --deploy-proxy-api --region us-east-1
scripts.lambda:update: claudia update --name crotonLambda --set-env-from-json envVariables.json --handler lambda.handler --deploy-proxy-api --region us-east-1
